wiki.summary: "How to Be Lonely" is a song by British singer Rita Ora. It was released as a standalone single on March 13th, 2020 by Atlantic. The song was written by Scottish singer Lewis Capaldi, Peter Rycroft and Thomas Mann of Stereo Kicks. Production was handled by aboutagirl. Capaldi offered the song to Ora after deciding it wasn't suitable for him, as he felt like he was—in his own words—"f******g s**t at singing it." "How to Be Lonely" reached top 10 positions in Belgium and Scotland and a peak of #57 in the UK. Read more on Last.fm.
